data.name: Video Game Tutorial
data.detailed_description:
A genre-discovering game
An opportunity to see popular genres from a new perspective: learn about them, try them, get a feeling of each genre on a different game level. Unless irony is not exactly your speciality.

A unique gameplay
Each presented genre has it’s own special feature: a unique character development system (platformer), superordinary artificial intelligence (horror), an original character-building system in a visual novel. Intrigued much?

Different locations
You find yourself in a completely different setting each level - as a part of game concept. Enjoy!

And so many more things you are about to discover …
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Have you ever dreamed of a game, where each level demonstrates a separate video game genre, uncovering it's specific features with a litlle irony? Well, today is your lucky day.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core AMD/Intel processor, 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 4GB / AMD R9 290 4GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
